US-B67EDA8E.title: Progress Bar During Extension Operation
US-B67EDA8E.description: As a user, I want to see a progress bar during operation of the extension, so that I can understand the status and progress of ongoing operations
US-B67EDA8E.i_want: to see a progress bar during operation of the extension
US-B67EDA8E.so_that: I can understand the status and progress of ongoing operations
acceptance_criteria: Progress bar appears when extension starts processing
Progress bar displays current operation status
Progress bar disappears when operation completes

US-022BEAD6.title: Find and fix design issues
US-022BEAD6.description: As a developer, I want to identify and resolve design inconsistencies and issues, so that the application has a consistent and polished user interface
US-022BEAD6.i_want: to identify and resolve design inconsistencies and issues
US-022BEAD6.so_that: the application has a consistent and polished user interface
acceptance_criteria: Audit current UI components for design inconsistencies
Identify typography, spacing, and color issues
Create list of design improvements needed
Ensure consistent design patterns across the application
